statements: DELETE FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'HTTP' AND source_ip = '192.168.0.1';
DELETE FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE bytes_sent >= 1000 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM anomaly_logs WHERE destination_ip = '192.168.0.1' AND timestamp < '2021-09-01';
DELETE FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE port = 80 AND timestamp < '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM anomaly_logs WHERE anomaly_type = 'DDoS Attack' AND timestamp > '2021-12-31';
DELETE FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE log_id = 100 AND protocol = 'HTTP'
DELETE FROM analysis_results WHERE result LIKE '%suspicious%';
DELETE FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE id = 100 AND bytes_sent > 1000000
